Detailed Description

A subclass of agg::svg::path_renderer which allows for vertex retrieval.

Date:
May 7, 2007 Derived from agg::svg::path_renderer. path_renderer2 implements an additional method which will return the vertices of the SVG path in an array. See method documentation for more information.
